title: Rock and Rule (1983)
description:
Rock & Rule

Year: 1983	
Run Time: 85 min.	
MPAA Rating: PG
Color Type: Color
Director: Clive A. Smith

AKA:
    * Rock &#039;n&#039; Rule
    * Rock and Rule
    * Rock & Rule

Genre:
    * Animated
    * Musical
    * Rock Musical
    * Musical Fantasy


Produced by: MGM/United Artists/ Nelvana
Video Distributor: Ventura Distributio


Synopsis:

Aging rock legend and black magician Mok is looking for the perfect voice to use with the Armegeddon Key in order to bring forth a powerful being from another dimension. He finds the perfect voice in Angel, singer and co-songwriter in a troubled small time rock band. When Angel defects with the evil Mok it&#039;s up to her former bandmates and friends to save her. 
An animated film by the people who made the original Care Bears movies, featuring music by Cheap Trick, Debora Harry, Iggy Pop, Lou Reed, and Earth Wind & Fire. Did I mention it&#039;s an apocalyptic sci-fi &#039;funny animal&#039; film? Fans of Heavy Metal and Ralph Bakshi&#039;s films will love this.
